name: Westfront
description:
Description

Westfront is a game where you have to defend a trench during the great war against an ever increasing number of enemy soldiers by ordering your own soldiers into defensive positions.

 

This game was produced at the university of applied sciences Europe by:

Lennart Knüppel(Programming and Game Design)

Niklas Hönk(3d art, animation and level design)

Phillip Comberg(UI, 2d-art, game design and organisation)

using:

-  Unity Engine

- astar pathfinding project Free
